entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT MONDAY... The Washington State Department of Ecology has issued an Air Quality Alert...in effect until 9 AM PDT Monday. A Smoke Air Quality Alert has been issued. Wildfires burning in the region combined with forecasted conditions will cause air quality to reach unhealthy levels.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 2:24AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG EXPECTED ACROSS NORTH-CENTRAL WISCONSIN THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog, with visibilities of one mile or less, will continue across north-central Wisconsin during the morning hours. The dense fog is expected to continue through mid morning before slowly lifting.
